requirements: Defeat the Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.
Defeat the Primo Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.
primo: Defeat a Pyro, Hydro, Cryo, and Electro Primo Geovishap.

requirements: Defeat the Maguu Kenki while he is taunting you.
Defeat an Electro Samachurl with no lightning totem on the field.

description: Did My Hand Fall From My Wrist?
requirements: Defeat a Thunderhelm Lawachurl while in an enhanced state.
Defeat a Mirror Maiden without being trapped by its Water Prison.
Defeat the Pyro Hypostasis after it enters its extinguished state only once
Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array in its weakened state.
Defeat Azhdaha without ever having gained a shield.
